TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CheckBoxField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField

summary.span: 表示数据绑定控件中以复选框形式显示的布尔型字段。

span.span: Represents a Boolean field that is displayed as a check box in a data-bound control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据绑定控件使用类 (例如 和 ) 在复选框中显示布尔数据字段的值。The class is used by data-bound controls (such as and ) to display the value of a Boolean data field in a check box. 对象的显示方式取决于使用它的数据绑定控件。The object is displayed differently depending on the data-bound control in which it is used. 例如， 控件 以列的形式显示对象，而控件则将 其显示为一行。For example, the control displays a object as a column, while the control displays it as a row. > [!NOTE] > 禁用复选框 (只读) 直到数据绑定控件在编辑模式下显示包含复选框的记录。A check box is disabled (read-only) until the data-bound control displays a record that contains the check box in edit mode. 若要详细了解如何将记录置于编辑模式，请参阅包含对象的父控件的文档 。For more information on how to put a record into edit mode, see the documentation for the parent control that contains the object. 若要指定要在对象中显示的字段 ，请 使用字段的名称设置属性。To specify the field to display in a object, set the property with the field's name. > [!NOTE] > 由于复选框只能显示选定或未选择的状态，因此对象只能 绑定到具有布尔数据类型的字段或可由分析的字符串 。Because a check box can display only a selected or an unselected state, a object can be bound only to a field with a Boolean data type or a string that can be parsed by . 通过设置属性，您可以在每个复选框旁边显示标题 。You can display a caption next to each check box by setting the property. 当属性设置为时，将在数据绑定控件中隐藏对象 `false` 。A object is hidden in a data-bound control when the property is set to `false`. 若要防止在编辑模式下修改字段的值，请将属性设置 为 `true` 。To prevent the value of a field from being modified in edit mode, set the property to `true`. 在支持 (例如控件) 插入记录的数据绑定控件中 ，您可以 通过将属性设置为来隐藏插入模式下的对象 `false` 。In data-bound controls that support inserting records (such as the control), you can hide a object in insert mode by setting the property to `false`. 您可以自定义对象的页眉和页脚部分 。You can customize the header and footer sections of a object. 若要在页眉或页脚部分显示标题，请分别设置 或 属性。To display a caption in the header or footer sections, set the or properties, respectively. 您可以通过设置属性来显示图像，而不是在页眉节中显示文本 。Instead of displaying text in the header section, you can display an image by setting the property. 通过将属性设置为，可以在对象中隐藏标头部分 `false` 。The header section can be hidden in the object by setting the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 某些数据绑定控件 (例如 控件) 可以仅显示或隐藏控件的整个标题部分。Some data-bound controls (such as the control) can show or hide only the entire header section of the control. 这些数据绑定控件不支持 单个绑定字段的属性。These data-bound controls do not support the property for an individual bound field. 若要显示或隐藏数据绑定控件的整个标题节 (如有) ，请使用控件的 `ShowHeader` 属性。To show or hide the entire header section of a data-bound control (if available), use the control's `ShowHeader` property. 还可以 通过设置字段的不同部分的样式属性，自定义对象的外观 (字体颜色、背景色等) 。You also can customize the appearance of the object (font color, background color, and so on) by setting the style properties for the different parts of the field. 下表列出了不同的样式属性。The following table lists the different style properties. |Style 属性Style property|说明Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||对象的子 Web 服务器控件的样式设置 。The style settings for the child Web server controls of the object.| ||对象的脚注部分的样式设置 。The style settings for the footer section of the object.| ||对象的标头部分的样式设置 。The style settings for the header section of the object.| ||对象中数据项的样式设置 。The style settings for the data items in the object.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件中的对象 ，以使用布尔数据类型从 Microsoft SQL Server 数据源显示字段。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object in a control to display a field from a Microsoft SQL Server data source with a Boolean data type. [!code-aspx-csharp[CheckBoxField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxField/CS/checkboxfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CheckBoxField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxField/VB/checkboxfieldvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化类的新实例 。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 当向动态创建的数据绑定控件添加字段时，通常使用此构造函数。This constructor is commonly used when adding fields to a dynamically created data-bound control. 若要将对象动态添加 到数据绑定控件，请创建一个新的 对象，设置其属性，然后将其添加到数据绑定控件的字段集合。To dynamically add a object to a data-bound control, create a new object, set its properties, and then add it to the data-bound control's field collection. 例如，如果使用 控件，请将 对象添加到 集合中。For example, if you are using the control, add the object to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 虽然您可以将字段动态添加到数据绑定控件，但强烈建议根据需要静态声明并显示或隐藏所有字段。Although you can dynamically add fields to a data-bound control, it is strongly recommended that all fields be statically declared and then shown or hidden, as appropriate. 静态声明所有字段可减小父数据绑定控件的视图状态的大小。Statically declaring all your fields reduces the size of the view state for the parent data-bound control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用构造函数将对象动态添加 到 控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to dynamically add a object to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CheckBoxFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxFieldCtor/CS/checkboxfieldctorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CheckBoxFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxFieldCtor/VB/checkboxfieldctorvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: to include the values of read-only fields; otherwise, .

summary.span: 使用指定的 对象中的值填充指定的 对象。

span.span: Fills the specified object with the values from the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供此方法是一种简便的方法，用于从对象中的指定对象检索字段的值 。The method is provided as a convenient way to retrieve the values of the fields from the specified object in a object. > [!NOTE] > 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is used primarily by control developers. 该方法没有返回值。This method does not have a return value. 相反，字段值通过 为参数传入的对象的引用返回 `dictionary` 。Instead, the field values are returned by reference through the object passed in for the `dictionary` parameter. 调用方法后，循环访问 对象以访问字段值。After the method has been called, iterate through the object to access the field values. > [!NOTE] > 如果 对象包含只读字段值，则必须传入 `true` 以便 `includeReadOnly` 参数包含这些值。If the object contains read-only field values, you must pass in `true` for the `includeReadOnly` parameter to include those values.

summary.span: 检索在设计器中呈现 对象时用于字段值的值。

span.span: Retrieves the value used for the field's value when rendering the object in a designer.
Always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一个帮助器方法，用于在 设计器中呈现对象时确定要为字段显示的值。The method is a helper method used to determine what value to display for a field when rendering the object in a designer. 如果在设计时无法从数据源中检索真实数据，则改为显示此方法返回的值。If real data can not be retrieved from the data source at design time, the value returned by this method is displayed instead.

para.span: 扩展类时 ，可以重写此方法，以便为设计器中的字段返回不同的值。

span.span: When extending the class, you can override this method to return a different value to display for the field in a designer.

summary.span: 将字段的值绑定到 对象中的复选框。

span.span: Binds the value of a field to a check box in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一个帮助器方法，用于将数据源中字段的值绑定到对象中的相应复选框 。The method is a helper method used to bind the value of a field in the data source to a corresponding check box in the object.

exception.span: 字段值绑定到的控件不是 控件。

span.span: The control to which the field value is bound is not a control.
-or-

exception.span: 字段值不能转换为布尔值。

span.span: The field value cannot be converted to a Boolean value.

para.span: 扩展类时 ，可以重写此方法以执行自定义绑定例程。

span.span: When extending the class, you can override this method to perform a custom binding routine.

summary.span: 获取或设置要显示在 对象中每一个复选框旁边的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the caption to display next to each check box in a object.

value.span: 显示在 中每一个复选框旁边的标题。

span.span: The caption displayed next to each check box in the .
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于显示对象中每个复选框旁边的标题 。The property is used to display a caption next to each check box in a object. 如果将 属性设置为空字符串，则不会显示标题。If the property is set to an empty string, no caption is displayed. > [!NOTE] > 对象中的所有复选框 共享相同的标题。All check boxes in the object share the same caption. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性为 控件中对象的复选框指定自定义标题 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom caption for the check boxes in a object in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CheckBoxField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxField/CS/checkboxfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CheckBoxField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxField/VB/checkboxfieldvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 确定包含在 对象中的控件是否支持回调。

span.span: Determines whether the controls contained in a object support callbacks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一个帮助器方法，用于确定包含在对象中的控件是否 支持回调。The method is a helper method used to determine whether the controls contained in a object support callbacks. 此方法已实现为空方法 (一个方法，该方法不包含任何代码) 以指示支持回调。This method has been implemented as an empty method (a method that does not contain any code) to indicate that callbacks are supported.

para.span: 从类派生的类 可以重写此方法，以指示字段包含的控件是否支持回调。

span.span: Classes that derive from the class can override this method to indicate whether the controls contained by the field support callbacks.

para.span: 若要指示支持回调，请将此方法实现为空方法，该方法不会引发异常;否则，将引发异常，并提供有用的消息，说明不支持回调的原因。

span.span: To indicate that callbacks are supported, implement this method as an empty method that does not throw an exception; otherwise, throw an exception with a useful message describing why callbacks are not supported.
